apps.title: MW Geofind
apps.desc: Created to discover youtube videos based on location and later adapted to search videos by specific channels and topic keywords.

media.title: (Bellingcat) Saudi Arabia & Murky European Weapons Transfers To Janjaweed Successor Group, 2019
(GoogleWatchBlog.de) YouTube Geofind: Search engine finds videos and livestreams near or at any location, 2019
(YouTube) D!NG: Slowest Progress Bars On The Internet!, 2017

apps.title: MW Metadata
apps.desc: Created to reveal everything about a video and it's channel that is available from the YouTube API. Provides useful processing of dates, country codes, language codes, geolocation, and more.

media.title: Trophy hunting: open-data exposes ethics problem

apps.title: MW Comment Suite
apps.desc: Created to download comments from every public upload from a channel to make it easier to find discussion based on certain topics. Now, given the climate for creators can also serve as a tool to archive comment history.

media.title: (SAGE Journal) Negotiating social bonds in a YouTube internet hoax
Covid-19: What are the Drivers of the Islamophobic Infodemic Communications on Social Media?

apps.title: Paint.NET Plugin Index
apps.desc: Created to make searching and discovering plugins for Paint.NET easier and quicker. Collaborated with Scott Stringer to retrofit into the forums, improve original design, and formatting his data to work with the app.

apps.title: Maps Let Loose
apps.desc: Advanced custom tactical map builder, collection of map knowledge, and more for the game Hell Let Loose.

apps.title: Bad Interface
apps.desc: A collection of horrible user input implementations inspired by r/badUIbattles. Bad birthdate, phone, volume, etc...

apps.title: hashID
apps.desc: Created to make it easier to determine hash types on the go without requiring the installation of Python.

apps.title: JExplorer
apps.desc: Created to make it easier to connect to multiple machines on a network managed with the same network user and browse the system file contents. Checks against SMB and FTP with supplied network range and credentials.

apps.title: Windows SMB Cracker
apps.desc: Created to remotely bruteforce logins on smb-enabled Windows machines. Successfully cracked an old forgotten 10-year-old windows server in college.

apps.title: Perry Co. R.R. & N&SV R.R. Geodata
apps.desc: QGIS mapping project tracing railroads torn up in the 1930s in Perry County, PA. Data files from the project provided for download. Cropped and geo-referenced aerial photography from the 1930s using Paint.NET and QGIS against present day Google Maps and like features.
